name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NFL News and Rumors from Pro Football Network

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The quickest and easiest way to get your daily football news.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your new tab screen and stay up to date with the latest NFL news and rumors from Pro Football Network (PFN). Every time you open a new tab, you'll see a fresh article from PFN - click through to read the full article or click 'Next' to see another.

For the best experience, after installing the extension click the ‘Keep it’ button on the ‘Change back to Google’ notification. 

Pro Football Network is a comprehensive sports media company that focuses on the NFL, fantasy football, NFL Draft, college football, and betting analysis. PFN's unique voices and engaging personalities connect with both casual and hardcore football fans through purposeful, captivating, and exceptional football content.
-----
Disclaimer:
This extension uses Google Analytics to collect extension usage statistics to help improve user experience. If you want to opt-out of Google Analytics tracking, please visit http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout or you can set up a filter in Adblock Plus or similar ad blocker tools like AdBlock, uBlock or Adblock Pro.

Our privacy policy can be found here: https://www.tabbyextensions.com/privacy-policy

Terms and conditions governing your use of this extension can be found here: https://www.tabbyextensions.com/terms-and-conditions
